name: Gau
abilities: The cost required to cast Gau is reduced by 1 for each Monster you control.
When Gau enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. If its cost is equal to or less than the number of Monsters you control, put it at the bottom of its owner's deck.
*Dull* *active* Gau: Choose 1 Monster. Until the end of the turn, it also becomes a Forward with 8000 power.
